Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs213.photoAlbum.control.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    controllerInterface

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements controllerInterface
    The controller object for the photo library.

    Jeff Kwok
